text: small game and game birds authority to set seasons amend rsa i to read as follows the executive director after consultation with the commission shall have the authority to open and close the seasons for the taking of small game and game birds as defined in rsa xxvi and xi except those birds protected under rsa and except for the taking of gray squirrel which shall be permitted year round to fix the number and sex limitations for small game and any other conditions governing the methods and manner of taking and reporting the same subject to any restrictions imposed by statute
